name: Slow-Cooker Chipotle-Black Bean Dip
description: Guests will gobble up this delicious hot dip bursting with colorful corn, salsa and beans.
recipeIngredient: 1  can (16 oz) Old El Pasoâ„¢ Traditional Refried Beans
1  can (15 ounces) black beans, rinsed and drained
1  can (11 ounces) whole kernel corn, red and green peppers, drained
2  chipotle chilies in adobo sauce (from 7-ounce can), chopped
1 1/2  cups shredded American-Cheddar cheese blend (6 ounces)

recipeInstructions.text:
Mix refried beans, black beans, corn, salsa, chilies, adobo sauce and 1 cup of
the cheese in 1 1/2- to 2-quart slow cooker.
Cover and cook on Low heat setting 3 to 4 hours, stirring after 2 hours.

Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese and the onions. Serve with tortilla
chips. Dip will hold on Low heat setting up to 2 hours; stir occasionally.
